long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Extractor - Manage Your Web Cookies with Ease

Cookie Extractor is a powerful browser extension designed for developers, testers, and privacy-conscious users who need to manage and manipulate cookies efficiently. With an intuitive interface and robust functionality, this tool simplifies cookie extraction, formatting, and management directly from your browser.

Features:

Formatted Output: Generate cookies in a JavaScript format for easy use in your development and testing environments.
API Integration: Send extracted cookies to a custom API endpoint with support for API keys.
Session Storage: Save and retrieve session data effortlessly within the extension.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and responsive popup interface with easy-to-use controls.
Customizable: Input your API key and URL for seamless integration with your server.

How to Use:

1. Click the Cookie Extractor icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the extension.
2. Input or paste your cookie data into the text area.
3. Click "Generate JS Format" to format the cookie data.
4. Optionally, enter your API key and URL, then click "Send" to transmit the data to your server.
5. Manage session data directly within the extension.

Perfect For:

Web Developers and Testers: Simplify debugging and testing by easily manipulating cookies.
Privacy Enthusiasts: Manage your cookies and control your online privacy.
Automation Experts: Integrate cookie management into your automation workflows.

Installation:

1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the Cookie Extractor extension.
2. Access the extension from the Chrome toolbar.

Get Involved:

Check out the source code and contribute to the project on [GitHub](https://github.com/CRB-CyberSec-Dev).

Credits:

Logo by [Flaticon](https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/smile_8383513).

Simplify your cookie management tasks with Cookie Extractor. Download now and take control of your web cookies!
